subject: New review (5★) of Simsonn Pro X Ultra Pedals with Baseplate and Carbon Fiber Heel Plate (from Julio C.)
description_text: Rating: 5 | Review Text: Bought these after seeing several positive things online. Pleasantly surprised to see that they’ve made additional improvements. I’m also eager to see how the new CAM shakers perform. One thing is certain - the pedals themselves feel pretty solid and with the optional tuning kit, there’s plenty to play around with. The ARGB is also a unique feature that sold me - can’t wait to get them on my rig. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ This review was automatically published.Learn more Brilliant!
